DOC.brief_summary: Although combination statin fenofibrate one option patient combine hyperlipidemia , non-lipid effect completely understood yet . In study compare effect rosuvastatin 10 mg/fenofibrate 160 mg combination rosuvastatin 10 mg monotherapy muscle liver enzyme , homocysteine level , kidney , blood glucose control , blood cell count .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability Efficacy Rosuvastatin - Fenofibrate Combine Therapy Korean Patients With Combined Hyperlipidemia
DOC.criteria: mixed hyperlipidemia : total cholesterol level higher 220 mg/dL , triglyceride ( TG ) level 200 500 mg/dL , lowdensity lipoprotein ( LDL ) cholesterol level higher 130 mg/dL 6week diet/life style change Men woman 20 70 year age Having least one history : coronary artery disease , cerebrovascular disease transient ischemic attack , peripheral vascular disease , diabetes mellitus . Having risk factor least two : age ≥45 year male ≥55 year female , elevate blood pressure ( systolic blood pressure ≥130 mmHg diastolic blood pressure ≥85 mmHg , treatment previously diagnose hypertension ) , highdensity lipoprotein ( HDL ) cholesterol < 40 mg/dL , family history coronary artery disease age < 55 year male < 65 year female , central obesity ( waist circumference ≥90 cm male ≥80 cm female ) , fast plasma glucose ≥110 mg/dL , leave ventricular hypertrophy electrocardiogram Written inform consent . pregnant breastfeeding uncontrolled hypertension uncontrolled diabetes mellitus thyroid dysfunction serum transaminase level > 2 time upper limit normal history gall bladder disease chronic alcoholic serum creatinine level > 1.5 mg/dL history myopathy history acute myocardial infarction acute stroke within 3 month study begin acute chronic infection inflammation history cancer history adverse event associate test drug .
DOC.keyword: rosuvastatin , fenofibrate , creatine kinase , alanine aminotransferase
